page.title: 10VISIT TO WORTH SCHOOL
page.content: A dozen 12 year old's from{St.Andrews{ visited{Worth School in June 1985.} The main difference between our schools is that you don't see your parents much.The{monks}are just like normal teachers. Many of the boys prefer their school to a state school, but they miss the{girls.}Supper & breakfast seem to be their best meal. Naughty boys are sent to the{Matron for{punishment.}If you walked past a monk you have to say "Good morning Father". You do not have much{privacy in the shower & changing rooms.The shower room is big with taps all around the walls.In their dormatories they have their own duvets from home. We arrived thinking they were posh, but we were wrong.The lessons are from {9.00}to{12.00}& in the late afternoon. Inbetween they have games from{1.00 till{2.00.
